message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'll take the bigger share since I made the first offer
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?
You wanted 55-45, I'll give you 42-58, but in my favor. It's only fair since your money is losing value
This is my last offer Alice.  52/48 split in my favor.  It accounts for some inflation, but is still a good deal for you before the money is worth even less for me.
You said that was your last offer, but I'm not buying it. My patience is wearing thin, take this 57-43 split or we'll be here forever
